subject: Management
title: Avoiding the Competence Trap
description: One-minute skill: Avoiding the Competence Trap.

hook.text: Sarah always got the big projects because she was reliable. She was also burning out.

buildup.text: Managers often over-delegate to their top performer because it feels safe.

discovery.text: This creates a competence trap: the best person gets overloaded while others stagnate.

twist.text: The 'safe choice' today produces a single point of failure and a resentful star tomorrow.

climax.text: Spread delegation widely. Developing five capable people beats burning out one hero.

quiz.question: What is the competence trap in delegation?
options: Over-relying on your best performer until they burn out
